description.value:
Granted Powers: You can manipulate water and mist and ice, conjure creatures of water, and resist cold.

Domain Spells:

  • 1st—@Compendium[pf1.spells.tuh5vc2bojaws3ig]{Obscuring Mist}
  • 2nd—@Compendium[pf1.spells.g33euis7yi9pwddy]{Fog Cloud}
  • 3rd—@Compendium[pf1.spells.7m5us8d4a9lwh1ap]{Water Breathing}
  • 4th—@Compendium[pf1.spells.7yf67b7y4byj96w7]{Control Water}
  • 5th—@Compendium[pf1.spells.t1uhggjfimtabp4v]{Ice Storm}
  • 6th—@Compendium[pf1.spells.pkm8um5t1cxsn6jh]{Cone of Cold}
  • 7th—@Compendium[pf1.spells.v42t5kpxc8mvd615]{Elemental Body IV} (water only),
  • 8th—@Compendium[pf1.spells.e8zen5nzixnt7bde]{Horrid Wilting}
  • 9th—@Compendium[pf1.spells.pfy97qyneoa391ek]{Elemental Swarm} (water spell only).
